articles.description: NOT one penny of a £50million fund for MND research has gone to scientists, it’s emerged. A charity hit out at the hold-up just days after rugby hero Doddie Weir died. The pot was pledged last Nove…
articles.content:

articles.author: Martin Samuel
articles.title: England's draw with the USA was NOT a disaster, says Martin Samuel - Daily Mail
articles.description: MARTIN SAMUEL - CHIEF SPORTS WRITER: The level of despondency because Gareth Southgate's players are not marching imperiously into the last 16 is extreme.
articles.content:
Since 1958, when the four-team World Cup group stage was formalised, how many of the 384 teams involved have endured the short, three-match process without dropping a single point?
Twenty nine. So, … [+13518 chars]

articles.title: 2022/23 Cazoo World Darts Championship draw - PDC.tv
articles.description: Peter Wright will begin his defence of the Cazoo World Darts Championship against either Mickey Mansell or Ben Robb, after the draw for the sport's showpiece event was made on Monday.

articles.title: World Cup 2022: Aboubakar stunner and Ghana joy light up 'wild' Monday in Qatar - BBC
articles.description: Cameroon and Serbia's thrilling draw and Ghana's frenetic win over South Korea combine to deliver the most entertaining day of the 2022 World Cup so far.
